# SpenGo

> Personal expense tracker powered by Google Sheets. No servers, no ads, no data collection.

## What is SpenGo?

SpenGo is a lightweight, mobile-first web application for tracking personal expenses. All data is stored directly in the user's own Google Spreadsheet — there are no backend servers, no databases, and no third-party data storage.

## Core Features

- Expenses saved directly to user's Google Drive via Google Sheets API
- Track spending by day, week, or month
- Categories: Food, Transport, Housing, Health, Entertainment, Sport, Clothes, School, Other
- Visual analytics with monthly breakdown by category
- Multilingual: English, Russian, Spanish
- Recent expenses cached locally in browser localStorage
- No ads, no tracking, no servers

## Tech Stack

- Vanilla JavaScript (ES Modules)
- Vite (build tool)
- Google Identity Services (OAuth 2.0)
- Google Sheets API v4
- Hosted on Vercel

## Pages

- [App](https://webspengo.vercel.app/): Main expense tracker interface. All features available after sign in via Google.
- [Privacy Policy](https://webspengo.vercel.app/privacy-policy/): Data usage and privacy information

## Privacy

SpenGo does not collect, store, or share any personal data. All expense data belongs to the user and lives in their own Google account. The app uses only `spreadsheets` and `drive.file` OAuth scopes — the minimum required to function.
